general.headline: Recruitment Consultant at M&T Resources

jobs.description:
Established in 1994 M&T Resources is a division of SMS Management & Technology (ASX:SMX); Australia's leading Consulting, Technology and Systems Integration Services Company. SMS employ over 1600 staff across Australia and South-East Asia with offices Brisbane, Sydney, Canberra, Melbourne, Adelaide, Perth, Hong Kong, Singapore and Vietnam.

At M&T, we source talented contract and permanent candidates most of which are from our own professional networks and are experts in hard to fill requirements. Despite the challenging economic situation of recent years we have maintained an average of 30% year on year revenue growth over the last six years with less than 1% contract failure rate. 

We work in partnership with high calibre organisations and assist them in managing the full recruitment lifecycle. As part of SMS Management & Technology we have industry knowledge which stand alone agencies do not have access to. Our above industry staff tenure results in consistency of account knowledge & service.

Morgan Consulting is a privately owned Australian company that has been providing recruitment consulting services to businesses since 1994. First established in Melbourne, we now have offices in all Australian capital cities. 

Our company has been successful in recruiting executive, technical, and business support staff in a wide range of industries; on a permanent, temporary and contract basis.

Our consultants are not just recruiters; they are first and foremost business people with an average of seven years working experience in the recruitment industry. They are true specialists who have a deep understanding of the service, practice group, industry sector and location in which they recruit.

We are proud of our reputation for high quality, honesty, and cost effective recruitment solutions; as well as our enviable placement success rate of 98%.

We place talented and experienced professionals in ICT, Business Support, Contact Centre, Financial Services, Healthcare & Medical, Human Resources, Accounting & Consulting, Legal, Retail, Sales & Marketing, and Technical & Operations.

I have an 11 year involvement in the Recruitment and IT industries with 6 years’ experience as a Recruitment Consultant for Information Technology. 

Specialties: I specialise in the technology sector and recruit both permanent and contract IT professionals into such positions including: IT Managers, Program and Project Managers, Business Analysts, Test Managers and Testers, Architects, Trainers, Infrastructure and Applications specialists, Business Analyst, SAP Specialists, Developers and Analyst Programmers, Level 1-3 Administrators and Engineers, Service Delivery Managers, IT Project Admin/Officers

jobs.description:

Paxus is an Adcorp Group Company, South Africa’s leading supplier of, staffing, human capital management and business process outsourcing services.

Believing that ethical conduct is essential to IT recruitment, Paxus is proud founding member of ITRCA, an IT association that is dedicated to maintaining an industry-specific code of conduct and ethics.

Candle, established in 1984, is one of the largest and longest standing IT recruitment specialist across the Asia Pacific region. Candle is a division of the Clarius Group (ASX:CND). 

Candle sources contract and permanent IT talent from Helpdesk Support to Project Managers and Chief Information Officers, covering the full project lifecycle as well as specialist niche technologies.
 
Over the last 25 years, Candle has built one of the largest IT specific databases providing a wealth of proven and active networks helping us gain access to consistent candidate referrals. general.headline: Director Customer Solutions at Optus
general.description:
I am a highly motivated and experienced IT sales leader with a 24 year track record of exceeding sales quotas, driving profitability and market share in a challenging and highly competitive industry. With a career spanning across Europe and A/NZ, I am a top performing sales professional with award winning excellence as both an individual contributor and in leadership positions managing teams of field based representatives across different business sectors for sales, technical and services. I have extensive experience in building and maintaining effective relationships across multiple business verticals, engaging at CXO and various levels of decision makers. I have built a comprehensive solutions knowledge portfolio, more recently in the enterprise software space. I am a proven sales leader in both business acquisition and customer retention. I am accountable, loyal and am passionate about building strategies to maintain, develop and acquire business that deliver value added outcomes.  
I thrive on delivering exceptional customer experience and gaining an intimate knowledge of customer business objectives, drivers and strategy and translating this into IT services and solutions. Received ongoing recognition as key talent, my profile has been consistently featured and presented in executive leadership talent review for multiple years since this initiative’s inception.  An avid contributor of mentoring programs, I am an active leader in the Career Development Program, where I have mentored many emerging talents and executives throughout their careers.

jobs.description: Business and technology working as one

As a member of the A/NZ leadership team for Dell Inc, I lead a direct team of 14 senior Account Executives and an extended team of 60+ sales and technical professionals, and am responsible for delivering $200 million+ revenue and $50 million+ of margin to the A/NZ business. I have consistently exceeded sales targets for the last 2 years. Proven ability to develop and cultivate strategic relationships with C-level customers and internal stakeholders Lead and collaborate across diverse functional leadership teams to set strategy and business objectives for the A/NZ region. Implement initiatives and provide guidance to strategy achievement for my business unit. Localize and implement business plans based on global corporate strategy. Help to manage the P&L of my business unit through strong budget controls, schedule tracking and effective motivational performance measurements. Build long-term career development and succession plans with proactive talent management strategies.  Apply influence, business acumen and negotiation skills to drive business results for my business unit and the greater Dell A/NZ organization. Strong expertise in bid and contract negotiations, proposal and value proposition development, and conflict resolutions.

general.headline: Sales Director - OEM
general.description:
Currently based in Sydney, with 20+ years experience in building, growing and managing pre-sales and sales teams in a multinational company within the Asia Pacific region. In the last 4 years I have built and am leading a team of sales and pre-sales professionals responsible for the entire networking business for Dell across Australia & New Zealand. Since assuming this role in 2011, the business has posted 15-20% year-on-year growth for 16 consecutive quarters. 

My passion lies in building and leading teams especially in startup or disruptive technologies, and growing businesses in the process. Dell Networking is a startup within the world's largest startup that is the now-privatized Dell. My goal is to build a $50M business by CY2015 and a world-class channel partner ecosystem a key pillar of the route to market.

jobs.jobTitle: Territory Manager (NSW) Healthcare, Education, Government & Not for profit
jobs.description:
Founded in 2009 by ex-Google engineers, the core engineering team at Nutanix include experts in distributed computing and web-scale infrastructure. Nutanix went on to use these technologies to make 'storage invisible' that is to replace traditional SAN and NAS devices with a software-defined service delivered on standard X86 servers. By doing so Nutanix became the market leader in the now called Hyperconverged infrastructure space. From there Nutanix rapidly evolved into a full blown Enterprise Cloud platform by delivering software-defined features that replace entire seperate products like All-Flash, Data Localisation, Deduplication, Self-Service Provisioning Portal, Cloud Connect to Microsoft Azure and AWS, File Services, Block Services, Container Services and even a Secure and Scalable Built-in Hypervisor.

I am responsible for all sales efforts in Healthcare, Education & Government accounts in NSW.

Started in a territory with less than a dozen customers during a quarter when the total
      revenue was less than a thousand dollars and grew it to just under a million dollars the
      
      next quarter and over 2 million the quarter after.
Took the patch from virtually non existent to 7 million a year in 3 years.

Lead a team of desk based pre-sales associates. Team of 6 spread across Sydney and
      Melbourne but also part of a larger team in other countries in the Asia Pacific. Achieved
      
      EMC's top award in 2007 which is the Platinum Team Player award.

Got involved in numerous pre-sales activities such as quoting, configurations,
      diagrams, ROI tools, tender responses, as well as ofcourse meeting customers and
      
      technical account management.

I am a highly motivated and achievement driven Human Resource Manager. Experienced in Recruitment, Human Resource Management and Learning & Development. I am a strong problem-solver with excellent time management and communication skills.

Currently I am working as a People and Culture Manager at Kloud Solutions in Sydney.

Kloud Solutions are partners with Microsoft , Telstra and Amazon Web Services, and have outstanding technical skills and capability. Kloud have extensive experience of working closely with our clients to set cloud strategy, develop roadmaps or prepare a business case, design effective public, private or hybrid cloud architectures and build and deploy solutions and applications.

We work with enterprise and government customers to offer the best technical expertise in the business, and are passionate about delivering outcome-focused solutions.

Our consultants are highly skilled and experienced professionals, and many are leaders in their field.

From initial strategy, to equipping a mobile field force, right up to moving entire data centres to the cloud – we have the expertise and the track record to ensure a smooth transition. 

Our people are our principal asset and key to our success, which is why we strive to attract, develop, retain and motivate the most talented people we can find. 

There’s never been a better time to join our team of highly-skilled consultants who are passionate about delivering outcome-focused IT services that help customers achieve their goals.

general.headline: Forbes 30 Under 30 | EY Entrepreneur of the Year National finalist | CEO & Founder of Capital J Investments, Executive Chairman & Co-Fo Fone Dynamics, Co-Fo Alicorn Ventures
general.description:
With an undeniable passion, focus and vision for long term capital growth and a plethora of high profile awards recognising his dynamic business capabilities, this 27-year-old entrepreneur is destined to succeed in any industry he invests in. 

Separating himself by taking bold risks with new technology and embracing an enthusiastic Gen Y attitude towards corporate dealings, Jordan attributes these values to the success and profitability of the businesses he has created over the years.

The former CEO and Managing Director of telecommunications company Fonebox Group - Jordan’s greatest achievement to date - saw the company obtain a prosperous and rewarding exit to Nasdaq-listed J2 Global in October 2016. 

Jordan recently founded and launched Capital J Investments to facilitate, support and mentor future leaders to achieve the same success. 

He is also the Co-Founder of Alicorn Ventures, which focuses on incubating high-growth technology fuelled companies open to wide array of industry verticals. 

Jordan is recognised as a seasoned entrepreneur and as such is finalist and winner of many accolades, including: National Finalist for 2016’s Ernst & Young ‘Entrepreneur of the Year’, Winner of the Brisbane Business News’ 2016 Entrepreneur of the Year and Finalist for Lord Mayor’s Young Business Person of the Year 2015 and 2016 to name a few.

jobs.description:
Capital J Investments is a company to house several private and public investments.
      This investment company has a diverse business portfolio holding varied assets under
      management, with a number of different business streams including wholly owned
      
      businesses and joint ventures all at various stages of development.

Alicorn Ventures is a private accelerator run by two of Queensland’s most awarded entrepreneurs: Dominic Holland and Jordan Grives. Alicorn Ventures typically engages market-leading organisations as co-founders who have identified a critical problem within their organisation or their respective industry, and/or long-term business models. 

Alicorn Ventures provides a high-growth accelerator designed to build, launch and grow companies that utilise technology at their core and to enable and provide a solution to these issues, often launching with our industry co-founders as the anchor customer.

The first of the Alicorn Ventures portfolio companies is Tap Tins, an offering built to address the dwindling collection of charitable cash donations to not-for-profits.

Tap Tins is an initiative to assist in funding charities via an electronic point of sale
      device that sits perfectly on any counter top, processing automated donations within a
      highly reliable platform. It is fund raising technology that is accessible and easier to
      
      contribute to.

Fone Dynamics designs, develops and offers state-of-the-art marketing attribution and communications technologies.  Our call tracking, voice and SMS products allow marketers to combine data and analytics to drive competitive decision-making across the globe, in an accessible and easy-to-use interface.
 
We focus on industry standards, high availability, service and security, which makes Fone Dynamics the number one choice for large enterprise and SMEs.

Jordan Grives was the former Managing Director & CEO of the multi-award winning telecommunications company Fonebox Group. 

Fonebox is Australia’s leading provider of corporate inbound services, specialising in inbound numbers, call routing and 24/7 live operator services, customised inbound solutions and an end-to-end reporting platform solution. 

BRW, Smart Company, Start Up Smart, Anthill Magazine and the Australian Institute of Management have recognised Fonebox nationally for its success.

In October 2016 Jordan had a successful exit to Nasdaq listed J2 Global.

general.headline: Building awesome teams. Delivering cloud solutions. Growing technical communities. Azure App Dev TSP @ Microsoft.
general.description:
If I'm not writing code or helping companies deliver software, I'm probably training, presenting or mentoring on new technologies, writing better code and the lessons I've learnt to help companies deliver software.

I'm passionate about 
- building awesome teams
- delivering  successful software projects 
- helping developers architect cloud based solutions using the latest technologies and best practices
- helping organisations understand where and why the cloud can benefit their business  

The topics that really get me going at the moment are: Azure, Angular, Machine Learning / AI / Cognitive Services and choosing the right micro-services strategy.
The topics I'm passionate about and put in my "everyone should be across" pile are: Scrum, clean code, dependency injection, writing great tests, and continuous delivery. 

I believe communication and agility lead to success: 'fail fast', inspect, adapt, have a lot of fun.  

I love a puzzle. My favourite is how to transform complex business requirements into working software, delivered incrementally, while educating and co-ordinating team members and stakeholders.

Specialties: Stakeholder management • Enterprise Architecture • Agile • C# • Azure • Machine Learning / AI  • Continuous Delivery • DevOps • Angular • Mobile Dev • ASP.Net MVC • .NET Core • Testing • SQL Server • Microservices • Surpassing Expectations through Superior Communication

general.headline: QLD Manager | Recruiter | Startup Mentor - Affix Group Pty Ltd
general.description:
I'm busy making a difference. I'm building the best tech/digital recruitment business in Brisbane and delivering change to an industry that is dominated by old values and sales principles.

The recruitment industry is broken.
We're going to fix it.

Disruption isn't the answer. I believe that the foundations are in place, recruitment just needs to be done better and that's where we come in.

affix was founded with the mission to push the boundaries of traditional recruitment processes and to lead industry innovation. affix is passionate about partnering with inspiring tech startups and leading employers who challenge the status quo and innovate via technology. 

The ultimate goal is to provide a unique alternative and to be a true ally in securing ambitious roles for ambitious people.

jobs.description:
At affix - we’re leading the way for positive change in the market, taking a game changing approach to partnering with our customers. We’ve based our success on your success and put the ball in your court as a candidate. 

We wanted a stronger guarantee that your career will remain in everyone’s best interest – yours, your employers and ours – from the start of our relationship to well after your appointment to the job.

Tech and Digital is what makes us tick, it's what we truly love and it's our world.

Ambition is a leading global boutique recruitment business operating in a select number of specialist areas across Brisbane, Sydney, Parramatta, Melbourne, Singapore, Hong Kong and London. We access hard to find, high calibre professionals within Banking, Finance and Technology.

We believe our size is a significant differentiator in the recruitment industry. We are big enough to undertake large scale projects for our clients yet retain the soul and personality of a smaller company.
We are best known for our specialisation with in-depth knowledge and expertise, well-established networks and deep relationships. We work towards ‘building better futures’ for our clients, candidates and our community.

Kloud work closely with our clients to set cloud strategy, develop roadmaps or prepare a business case, design effective public, private or hybrid cloud architectures and build and deploy solutions and applications. We integrate hosted solutions with existing systems and establish effective systems and infrastructure management for maximum IT advantage and business value.

I am very proud to be part of the Kloud People and Culture team and to continue in supporting and developing strategies to ensure our culture stays strong  whilst networking and building relationships with specialists that match our core technical areas. 
Kloud's aim is not just to build or deploy technology successfully - we actively work with our clients to ensure the solutions we create can be effectively managed and used by staff and stakeholders.

At Kloud, we take great pride and privilege in working with some of the most talented professionals in the industry and stand-out enterprise level customers. 
Passion, dedication, professionalism and an unwavering team spirit and commitment to succeed, are part and parcel of the DNA of all our people.  
We’re after amazing people to help us make amazing things happen.

general.headline: People and Culture Manager at Kloud Solutions
general.description:
I have expertise and interest in talent acquisition strategy, executive search, operational excellence, EVP & employer branding.

Currently I am the Manager, People and Culture at Kloud Solutions in NSW. My overall goal is to ensure that the recruitment process is effective and efficient and make sure that the opportunities we offer consultants are exciting and challenging and generally awesome. 

Kloud Solutions are partners with Microsoft , Telstra and Amazon Web Services, and have outstanding technical skills and capability. Kloud have extensive experience of working closely with our clients to set cloud strategy, develop roadmaps or prepare a business case, design effective public, private or hybrid cloud architectures and build and deploy solutions and applications.

We integrate hosted solutions with existing systems and establish effective systems and infrastructure management for maximum IT advantage and business value. We work with enterprise and government customers to offer the best technical expertise in the business, and are passionate about delivering outcome-focused solutions.

Our consultants are highly skilled and experienced professionals, and many are leaders in their field. 

Key Skills:
Executive Search, Market Mapping and Head Hunting
Pipelining and engagement/ communication strategies
Developing Strategic Sourcing Strategies
Stakeholder/Client Management
Regional & International recruitment
Coaching Managers on Recruitment best practice
Developing resourcing solutions

jobs.description:
Australia is one of the worlds leading countries in terms of public cloud adoption and Kloud is at the absolute forefront of integrators leading the charge. 

Since 2010, Kloud has helped many of Australia’s biggest brands transform their business, reduce costs, streamline processes and introduce revolutionary new services with cloud computing. From initial strategy, to equipping a mobile field force, right up to moving entire data centres to the cloud – we have the expertise and the track record to ensure a smooth transition. 

Our people are our principal asset and key to our success, which is why we strive to attract, develop, retain and motivate the most talented people we can find. 

There’s never been a better time to join our team of highly-skilled consultants who are passionate about delivering outcome-focused IT services that help customers achieve their goals. Kloud work closely with our clients to set cloud strategy, develop roadmaps or prepare a business case, design effective public, private or hybrid cloud architectures and build and deploy solutions and applications. We integrate hosted solutions with existing systems and establish effective systems and infrastructure management for maximum IT advantage and business value.

Kloud's aim is not just to build or deploy technology successfully - we actively work with our clients to ensure the solutions we create can be effectively managed and used by staff and stakeholders.

EY are committed to building a better working world - one with increased trust and confidence in business, sustainable growth, development of talent and greater collaboration.

My role was centred around the identification and engagement of candidates and prospects who are necessary in growing our businesses, the mapping of competitor companies, and the development of talent pools and pipelines for both immediate short-term and strategic long-term business requirements. 

As a Talent Sourcing professional I was responsible for identifying and engaging senior and rare top talent for hard-to-fill roles across the Asia Pacific region, predominately supporting EY’s Technology Advisory Service Line.

Deloitte Australia provides a range of professional services - audit, tax, consulting and financial advisory. Our goal in connecting people is simple: we want to change our client's capacity to act.
 
The People & Performance (P&P) team is critical to delivering on Deloitte’s vision to be the most inspiring firm to work with. We are known for our insight, navigating successful outcomes, and our ‘how might we?’ approach. We are proud of building a culture where our employees can truly say ‘only at Deloitte’.

My focus was to work both strategically and operationally with our Assurance & Advisory business nationally.

We provide assurance or advisory services to a large number of the Top 100 ASX companies and are continuing to experience rapid growth. In drawing on our specialist skills and thorough understanding of our clients’ businesses and their industries we help them identify major opportunities and risks beyond the traditional financial reporting function and improve their business performance and objectives.

Carlyle Associates is a leading Executive Search, interim and senior recruitment practice, based in Edinburgh. We have over 50 years combined experience of sourcing and securing key talent across all commercial disciplines on a permanent and senior interim basis. As advisors to a wide range of senior professionals our sector experience includes Financial Services, Technology, Public Sector, Professional Services (Consultancy, Legal & Accountancy) and our clients range from entrepreneurial start-ups to established plc’s.

 We have successfully completed complex head hunting assignments across the UK as well as internationally, giving each the same diligent and personal attention. As Scotland’s sole member of the Cornerstone network, we have key alliances with over 100 partner firms globally, allowing us direct access to candidates and businesses in all the main business capitals.

 Carlyle Associates are also proficient and renowned for facilitating mutually beneficial senior commercial introductions and partnerships.

I worked as part of the Hudson RPO solution, designed to source and retain the best talent across the Macquarie Group.

Macquarie Group (Macquarie) is a global provider of banking, financial, advisory, investment and funds management services.

Macquarie’s main business focus is making returns by providing a diversified range of services to clients. Macquarie acts on behalf of institutional, corporate and retail clients and counterparties around the world

I was responsible  for managing a portfolio of Stakeholders across Westpac's Institutional Bank including:

WIB Technology
Global Transactional Services
International Operations
Pacific Banking

Developing and maintaining strong relationships is central to my role, this enables me to work strategically with the business and in turn recruit the best talent.

Working in the PwC Human Capital team who are responsible for the lateral end to end
      recruitment process, my focus was to work with the Internal IT house and the
      
      Enterprise Performance Solutions group to recruit the best talent into PwC.

Spring technology specialise in resourcing high quality individuals from the IT and
      telecommunications industry.  I work closely with a variety of organisations from start
      
      up ventures to Blue Chip companies.

Working as part of a team of five Professionals at a dedicated Teaching and Golf
      
      Development Academy in Edinburgh.

My expertise lies in maintaining databases, analyzing patterns, producing reports, advising management, understanding business needs, finding solutions to improve processes, and reducing operation costs. I have been involved in all phases of the software development life cycle including database design, application architecture, coding, database development, project management, and performance tuning.   My career accomplishments demonstrate comprehensive expertise in managing database programs, extracting and evaluating sophisticated data, and translating results into understandable terms to inform strategic business planning and facilitate improved operations.

schools.description: Excellence in dimensional modeling remains the keystone of a well designed data warehouse. This course gives you the opportunity to learn directly from the industry’s dimensional modeling leaders, Ralph Kimball and Margy Ross.You will learn practical dimensional modeling techniques covering basic to advanced issues. Following the tradition of the Data Warehouse Toolkit, all the techniques in this class are motivated by specific industry scenarios. The goal is for students to gain an in-depth understanding of dimensional modeling so they can confidently apply the concepts in their workplace following the training

schools.description: You can use Biml to create tables, flat files, SSIS packages, and SSAS models. This language is human readable, unlike the XML that is represented within dtsx files and SSAS objects. This readability can help reduce the learning curve required for most programming languages.Biml will not teach you SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) or SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS) but can enhance and increase your productivity with these tools with certain use cases.The Biml languages is supported within two Integrated Development Environments (IDEs): Business Intelligence Development Studio (BIDS) and SQL Server Data Tools (SSDT), with the BIDS Helper add-in (free) or the Mist application from Varigence (purchased product). Currently BIDS Helper is supported with SQL Server 2005, 2008, and 2008 R2 BIDS, SQL Server 2012 and 2014 SQL Server

general.headline: Systems Support and Development at TAFE Queensland Skillstech
general.description: Experienced Systems Support and Development Professional with a demonstrated history of working in the Education Management industry and Queensland Government Departments. Skilled in Windows Server Administration, Microsoft SharePoint Development and Administration, Microsoft SQL Server Administration, Full stack development solutions utilizing the .NET Framework and providing reporting using the Microsoft Business Intelligence Stack. Strong Systems Engineering Professional with a Bachelor of Information Technology (B.IT) focused in Network Systems and IT Security from the Queensland University of Technology.

jobs.jobTitle: ICT Support - Systems Support and Development
jobs.description:
- Providing IT Support to TAFE staff
- Troubleshooting problems over the Phone, E-mail, Lync IM and face-to-face
- Providing support for NEC Telephony Systems
- Logging requests to outsourced IT Support on behalf of TAFE users	
- Liaising with outsourced IT Support to work on Support Issues
- Managing Assets and providing assistance in Asset Disposal
- Relocation and Rollout of Hardware and Peripherals
- Administration of Microsoft SharePoint 2010 Intranet Portal
- Development of new IT Systems as required
- Assisting in the upgrade of existing IT Systems
- ASP.NET Web Application Development
- Providing solutions for reporting via SQL Server Reporting Services
- Documentation of new and existing processes for future reference
- Creation of Business Intelligence Reports from Data Cubes
- Creation of custom Tools or Scripts for use by IT Staff
- Testing and review of new devices such as Smartphones and Tablets
- Supporting AV equipment

- Providing IT Support to QLD Education Schools and other Corporate Clients	
- Troubleshooting and repairing Desktop PCs, Notebooks, Printers and Audio Visual Equipment
- Installation and configuration of Hardware and Software
- Imaging of PCs and creation of custom images where required
- Software deployment and creation of custom software package installations
- Installation and Support of Network Devices
- Network Rack Patching and Data Cable Management
- Rollout of PC hardware across multiple organisations
- Administering Windows Server OS
- Administering Active Directory and Group Policy

- Level 2 and 3 Support for IT Desktop and Security Services
- Managing and supporting over 12000 devices state-wide
- Managing and supporting Multiple Critical Firewall solutions
- Managing and supporting Anti-Virus solutions
- Filtering Network Access and Email for organisation
- Working alongside Desktop Support to provide assistance with Hardware and/or Software connectivity issues			
- Troubleshooting Connectivity Issues to and from external parties
- Liaising with Regional Support Officers and Interdepartmental Support Personnel to resolve support calls.
